mutants.code:
def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = words[::+1]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = words[::-1]
    reversed_string = ''.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = words[::-2]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = words[::-0]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = words[::-0]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    reversed_words = words[::--1]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string
